channel.title: New Skill: Inventing
channel.description:
Well, it was officially announced to come out in 2014. With this skill you will be able to upgrade weapons and later, skilling tools. New weaponry such as the Soul weapons and lightning weapons are affiliated with the skill.
Here is some concept art.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131102193942/runescape/images/thumb/1/16/Soul_eater_weapon_concept.png/640px-Soul_eater_weapon_concept.png[/img] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131102194031/runescape/images/thumb/a/a8/Lvl_90_weapons_2_hand.png/585px-Lvl_90_weapons_2_hand.png[/img]
I'd like to see how Jagex pulls this one off.

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:22, topic:535164”]I like how weapons looks, but idea is bad :palm: :palm: …
There is already so many weapons which no1 uses…[/quote]
Which may now give them a use, such as the grifolic wand.

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:17, topic:535164”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=653968.msg4381246#msg4381246 date=1383616185]
I understand… it’s a construction skill but with items seperate of fletching? The last image looks like a rune scimitar with a crossbow
[/quote]
Wut? That doesn’t look like a Rune scimitar. The front part of it with the arms is a Zaryte bow.[/quote]
Looks like it also might have karils pistol bow on the side, made out of karils 2h bow, royal crossbow, and magic shieldbow. With zaryte bow at tip like you said. Pretty badass bow if you ask me.

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m curious how it will become a “skill”

If you think about it in fletching you make thousands of bows. You would think it would be similar you would have to invest thousands of items which would mean you would have to have the actual material for thousands of combinations?

Either way I look forward to the update. They mentioned something about the beta testers will be able to try out the skill first so I can’t wait as I should be a beta tester.

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:12, topic:535164”][quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=653968.msg4380884#msg4380884 date=1383515729]

[quote author=Travas link=topic=653968.msg4380806#msg4380806 date=1383493831]

Thanks for quoting the post from runescape wiki.
[/quote]Does it matter? I brought it here for discussions, it’s not a big deal.

Though I do wonder how this skill is going to tie together with Divination.

You took that in the wrong way my friend, i wasnt making it a big deal, dont get snappy with me.
[/quote]I don’t see how I was snappy, but don’t continue making off topic posts unless you have something to contribute to the discussion.

[quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=653968.msg4380831#msg4380831 date=1383501476]
That sounds badass haha. Probably the sweetest skill yet.
[/quote]I’m gonna have to wait and see to make my opinion, but the idea does sound pretty awesome.[/quote]

Lol ok buddy, The skill seems to be interesting. Heard something about changing up smithing and some other skills as well?

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t really like the idea of ‘inventing’ in a game where everything is precoded. It’s not actually inventing. But it sounds interesting, just poorly named.

What if you could create a system where everything isn’t “precoded”? I’ve always wanted to make an alchemy system for rsps that was based upon the properties of materials just like in real life chemistry. Then allow a bookwriting system so people could publish their own materials they created and people could buy their books kind of like recipes

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:

I don’t really like the idea of ‘inventing’ in a game where everything is precoded. It’s not actually inventing. But it sounds interesting, just poorly named.

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:7, topic:535164”]Random idea after watching a video of people breaking apart these pictures. Seems that there are 5 weapons that go into each of the new ones. Staff combines a virtus wand, gifloric wand, seismic wand, arma b staff (middle), and a mystic orb (bottom). Now add all those stats together and you got one badass staff. Possibly not that simple maybe some re balancing due to all those stats combined being extremely overpowered, or maybe that isn’t even 90 equipment and possibly its 99? Just some random thoughts.

EDIT: With this skill the possibilities are huge with the type of equipment you’ll be able to use. Hopefully they allow us to use this with armor also.[/quote]
Jesus fuck, that’d be one expensive weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: New Skill: Inventing
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Random idea after watching a video of people breaking apart these pictures. Seems that there are 5 weapons that go into each of the new ones. Staff combines a virtus wand, gifloric wand, seismic wand, arma b staff (middle), and a mystic orb (bottom). Now add all those stats together and you got one badass staff. Possibly not that simple maybe some re balancing due to all those stats combined being extremely overpowered, or maybe that isn’t even 90 equipment and possibly its 99? Just some random thoughts.

EDIT: With this skill the possibilities are huge with the type of equipment you’ll be able to use. Hopefully they allow us to use this with armor also.

Read full topic
